languages.text: "Приятное разнообразие — сразу стрелять не начали. Только, Лорд-капитан, вид этого... отребья никакого доверия не внушает".
"Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."
languages.original_text: "Приятное разнообразие — сразу стрелять не начали. Только, Лорд-капитан, вид этого... отребья никакого доверия не внушает".

traits.locale_text: "Well, this is a welcome change — talking first. Still, Lord Captain, the appearance of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."
"Well, this is a welcome change — talking first. Still, Lord Captain, the appearance of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."
"Well, this is a welcome change — talking first. Still, Lord Captain, the appearance of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."
"Well, this is a welcome change — talking first. Still, Lord Captain, the appearance of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."
"Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."
"Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."

languages.text: "Das nenne ich mal eine willkommen Abwechslung – erst reden, dann schießen. Dennoch, Lord Captain, das Aussehen dieses ... zwielichtigen Haufens ist nicht gerade vertrauenerweckend."
languages.original_text: "Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."

traits.locale_text: "Das nenne ich eine willkommen Abwechslung – zuerst reden. Dennoch, Lord Captain, das Aussehen dieses ... zwielichtigen Haufens ist nicht gerade vertrauenerweckend."

languages.text: « Discuter avant de tirer dans le tas ? Quelle agréable surprise. Cela dit, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, l'apparence de cette... bande dépenaillée ne m'inspire guère confiance. »
languages.original_text: "Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."

traits.locale_text: « Discuter avant d'en venir aux mains ? Quelle agréable surprise. Cela dit, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, l'apparence de cette... bande dépenaillée ne m'inspire guère confiance. »

languages.text: “噢，他们居然学会了先谈判再开火，这确实是个可喜的变化。不过，舰长大人，这个……破衣烂衫的人很难让人信任。”
languages.original_text: "Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."

traits.locale_text: “噢，他们居然学会了先谈判再开火，这确实是个可喜的变化。不过，舰长大人，这个……破衣烂衫的人很难让人信任。”

languages.text: 「これは歓迎すべき変化ですね。撃ち合いよりも話し合いとは。ですがロード・キャプテン、この有象無象の集団の風貌は…とても信用できるものではありません」
languages.original_text: "Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."

traits.locale_text: 「ええ、これは歓待すべき変化です。ですがロード・キャプテン、この…寄せ集めの連中の外見からは、信用できません」
「これは歓迎すべき変化ですね。撃ち合いよりも話し合いとは。ですがロード・キャプテン、この有象無象の集団の風貌は…とても信用できるものではありません」

languages.text: «Es una novedad agradable: alguien que habla antes de disparar. Aun así, Lord Capitán, el aspecto... desaliñado de este grupo no inspira demasiada confianza».
languages.original_text: "Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."

traits.locale_text: «Vaya, alguien que habla antes de actuar, qué sorpresa. Aun así, Lord Capitán, el desaliñado aspecto de este grupo no inspira demasiada confianza...».

languages.text: "Tetiğe basmak yerine konuşan birileriyle karşılaşmak, hoş bir değişiklik. Yine de bu... Ayaktakımının görünüşü pek güven telkin etmiyor Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Well, this is a welcome change — talking before shooting. Still, Lord Captain, the look of this... ragtag bunch hardly inspires trust."

traits.locale_text: "Tetiğe basmak yerine konuşan birileriyle karşılaşmak, hoş bir değişiklik. Yine de bu... Ayaktakımının görünüşü pek güven telkin etmiyor Lord Kaptan."
